author: svq
content: Will #4 occur at the time of the merge or when withdrawals are later enabled?

author: schone_wizard
content: you mean the the private key for the withdrawal credential is needed?

author: schone_wizard
content: why aren't we adding that at the time of merge, giving more of a chance to people who'se seeds have been compormised a chance to set things to a new address

author: schone_wizard
content: before withdrawals are actually enabled and start occuring

author: djrtwo
content: if seeds were compromised, it doesn't matter when the change of credential feature is added

author: djrtwo
content: because at that point, it's a race between you and the attacker

author: djrtwo
content: and "why" -- the feature is relatively nascent in design and the Merge is committed to being minimal to get it done

author: schone_wizard
content: well thank you for the response and explanation!

author: pietjepuk
content: See also https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4736 on the topic of "how to help those with compromised seeds"
